ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS (REAR IMPACT GUARDS) by making it mandatory for most new (cargo) trailers to be equipped with a rear impact guard that meets specified dimensional, deflection and energy absorption criteria.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2004-0195 Publication Date: 2004-10-06
